rules.summary: rs174547 in FADS1 has been associated with differences in omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acid levels in population studies.

default_summary: No call or unrecognized genotype for rs174547.
suggestion: Dietary omega-3 intake (e.g., fish or algae sources) is a direct way to influence levels. This is not medical advice.

evidence_level.summary: Associations exist but effects are modest and context-dependent.

limitations: This does not measure actual omega-3 status. Diet is the dominant factor.
